title: AMQP 0-9-1 Operation Binding Object
description:
This object contains information about the operation representation in AMQP.
See https://github.com/asyncapi/bindings/tree/master/amqp#operation-binding-object.

expiration.description: TTL (Time-To-Live) for the message. It MUST be greater than or equal to zero. Applies to Publish, Subscribe.

userId.description: Identifies the user who has sent the message. Applies to Publish, Subscribe.

cc.description: The routing keys the message should be routed to at the time of publishing. Applies to Publish, Subscribe.

priority.description: A priority for the message. Applies to Publish, Subscribe.

deliveryMode.description: Delivery mode of the message. Its value MUST be either 1 (transient) or 2 (persistent). Applies to Publish, Subscribe.

mandatory.description: Whether the message is mandatory or not. Applies to Publish.

bcc.description: Like cc but consumers will not receive this information. Applies to Publish.

replyTo.description: Name of the queue where the consumer should send the response. Applies to Publish, Subscribe.

timestamp.description: Whether the message should include a timestamp or not. Applies to Publish, Subscribe.

ack.description: Whether the consumer should ack the message or not. Applies to Subscribe.

bindingVersion.description: The version of this binding. If omitted, "latest" MUST be assumed. Applies to Publish, Subscribe.
